page.title: 19LOCAL PRESS/ANALYSIS/COMMENT
page.content: The local newspaper,published weekly on Thursdays,is called The Lytham St. Annes Express.The Company which owns this paper also publishes the Evening Gazette each week day covering the whole of the Fylde.The Express has been printed for 95 years.The paper contains different sections for specialised topics.For example,the classified section, sportscene,youth limelight,Women's Express and TV details.Youth File contains stories involving children from local schools -events and entertainment for the Youth are included.The classifieds provide for people selling articles from antiques to animals and from bicyles to Bibles.The paper also features items of local controversy news,court cases and Council activities.Local Library built l878, 25,000 books and 3,000 members.
